column4: It takes me a very long time to log on. Any pointers on where to look for the problem?
i don't know if gnome has the same issue with loopback, but kde sometimes goes really slowly in the loopback interface is not up
how can I check if loopback is up or not at login?
was it always slow and did it just start to slow down after some event?
I usually run my own, custom kernel, but switching back to the Ubuntu kernel introduced the problem!
